Package net.sf.JRecord.Common

This package holds Common code used in multiple JRecord packages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbsRow
    This is an abstract (interface) definition of a table Row (or Record).
    AbstractFieldValue
    Interface to one field from a line (or Record).
    AbstractIndexedLine  
    AbstractManager
    Abstract Manager - Interface of a class that manages other classes
    AbstractRecord
    Very Basic RecordLayout interface.
    AbstractRecordX<FieldDefinition extends IFieldDetail>
    Extended Abstract Record (Record-Schema) where you can get the Field Definition and Field Count
    Constants
    Constants used in JRecord
    IBasicFileSchema
    A minimal File Schema definition.
    IEmptyTest  
    IFieldDetail
    Description of one field in a Record (Line)
    IGetData
    Any class that has a getData() method
    IGetFieldByName  
    IJrTranslation
    Purpose: provide basic Language Translation services This interface is duplicated in IUiTranslation (Record Editor Ui) and extended by IReTranslation
    ILineFieldNames  
    XmlConstants
    XML Constants used in JRecord
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicFileSchema
    A basicSchema class for use in testing
    BasicJrTranslation  
    BasicKeyedField
    A basic Row consisting of an integer key and a String field name.
    BasicManager<managedClass>
    This class stores / returns managed classes to the calling program based on a supplied index.
    BasicNamedManager<managedClass>
    Class to manage other classes (with a name given to the managed classes).
    ByteArray  
    CommonBits  
    Conversion
    This static class holds various conversion routines
    Conversion.HoldEbcidicFlag
    Class to hold character-set details
    FieldDetail
    This class stores the description of one field in a record (or Line).
    Messages  
    PropertyManager  
    TranslateXmlChars  
    UserInit  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RecordException
    Error class for Jrecord / RecordEditor
    RecordRunTimeException  

Package net.sf.JRecord.Common Description

This package holds Common code used in multiple JRecord packages. Main classes

  • Constants (i.e. IO, Record Type and XML Constants) used by the RecordEditor
  • ConversionLow level conversion routines.
  • FieldDetail Describes one field in a file.
  • RecordException Exception thrown by JRecord / RecorEditor.
